speaker: player
text: Barely managed to land my ship before the batteries run out.

speaker: player
text: What is this place? Seems abandoned...

speaker: player
text: No signs of life on the scanners either. But stll some power going.

speaker: player
text: Well, let's find a way to recharge my ship and get going again.

speaker: player
text: I should explore and see what I can find...
